attributes.action: Get Shubha Hurkat back into the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Shubha Hurkat is an asset to the software industry of Great Britain.  Her standards of quality assurance and tireless pursuit of high standards are a rare find in todays IT industry.

Her contribution, not only as a UK tax payer, but also as an IT professional, mentor to other professionals and provider of IT services far exceeding the usual standards of the UK IT industry should be recognised and I urge the government to grant her a permanent residency Visa to work in this country.

rejection.details: E-petitions cannot be published on the subject of individual cases.
